verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kahe,-doṅhāra susatya vacana
āge yadi kṛṣṇa dena sākṣāt daraśana

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya kahe—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said; doṅhāra—of both; su-satya—correct; vacana—statements; āge—first; yadi—if; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; dena—gives; sākṣāt—direct; daraśana—audience.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said, "The statements of both of you are correct. Kṛṣṇa gives direct audience through His own mercy.
